title: Save Mayrina
content: e quick. At the start of the encounter, Ethel will spawn 3 clones of herself. Dealing a little bit of damage to a clone will destroy it. You can tell which one is the real Ethel as only the real on can be debuffed. Magic Missile is a great way to quickly get rid of her clones. You do not have to kill Auntie Ethel to finish the fight - take her to low health and she'll surrender, offering you power.
